name: Trello Theme: Even more plain
description:
A modification of Samuel Dellicour's "Trello theme: plain boxes"
https://userstyles.org/styles/80265/trello-theme-plain-boxes

Even more simple and made to work with the Trellists Chrome Extension. 
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/trellists-trello-lists-ma/dgnlcodfeenegnifnpcabcclldoceeml

Setup to work with Open Sans font.
